name: Andromeda: Tactical Lighting
description:
USE COUPON CODE: OUTGROWME for 10% off Andromeda!

Andromeda is the world's first military inspired tactical tri-rail lamp. It fully utilizes the picatinny rail system, allowing you to uniquely customize the look of your lamp. Andromeda has received worldwide coverage and featured on many popular blogs including (Uncrate, Gizmag, and MeWanty) For the full design story, please check out the Kickstarter Link Below: Kickstarter Andromeda: Tactical Lighting Features: Unique Tri-Rail Design Instead of using an existing quad rail system, we developed our own patent pending, tri-rail design. Our rail is made up of three extrusions offset at 120ยบ that bolt together to create a full tri-rail system. Adjustable Shades and Legs: Each Individual shade can easily be adjusted to countless configurations. The legs can also be adjusted to increase or decrease the height of the overall lamp. The picatinny mounts are adjusted using the included allen wrench to lock/unlock the legs and shades into place. Stealth On/Off Switch: Inspired by military and stealth operations. The on/off switch has been discreetly integrated into the lamp. High Quality Materials: The Tri-rail itself is made out of aircraft grade extruded aluminum. The Arms, legs and Shades are are all aluminum as well. Other components include high quality ABS plastic, cloth woven electrical cord, and various anodized bolts. Included in Box: Andromeda Tactical Lamp (Black Hardware) Each lamp will come with a 40 watt nostalgic bulb. (as pictured) 1 allen key Instructions

*International Orders: Please keep in mind that the Andromeda Lamp was designed to use the 120v system.*

***Now Shipping***

name: Nostalgic Edison-Style Lightbulb
description:
Replacement Lightbulb for Andromeda: Tactical Lighting

-Standard E27 Socket
-40 Watt Edison-Style Lightbulb
-Visible Filament

name: T-Shirts
description:
Show your support by proudly wearing the Andromeda insignia. The final T-shirt design was voted on by our Kickstarter Backers.  Each T-Shirt is made out of a 90% Cotton, 10% polyester blend and is preshrunk. 

Color: Light Grey. 
Sizes available: S,M,L,XL

*MEDIUM CURRENTLY SOLD OUT*
